we don't typically jump for joy and

and if you look at our platform all the
way around the outside it doesn't
actually touch allowing it to grow and
get wider as it gets older and taller if
you look under here a big leg that it's
connected to has a big telescoping bolt
on it so as these trees grow we can
raise or lower the platform so our whole
course will grow with the trees keeping

the most eco-friendly way to fly yeah
there's a little adrenaline and the

I'm sure flies when you're having fun
the foodie culture here in Asheville
